subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: The wild card Patricia Mayr-Archleitner routed Ksenia Pervak, 6-0, 6-0, in less than 48 minutes at the Gastein Ladies in Bad Gastein, Austria, to reach her first WTA Tour final.
snippet: The wild card Patricia Mayr-Archleitner routed Ksenia Pervak, 6-0, 6-0, in less than 48 minutes at the Gastein Ladies in Bad Gastein, Austria, to reach her first WTA Tour final.
